title: Interpretation of menstrual pain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual pain for unmarried women. Menstrual blood in a dream. A free girl. It indicates the collapse of worries and freedom from problems. The vision suggests getting rid of the consequences you face at work. Menstrual pain in a dream indicates the beginning of preparations for marriage. The vision indicates achieving goals and obtaining a new job. The vision is good and the sustenance that one woman will get soon. Washing off menstrual blood. This indicates in a dream that the girl feels remorse for a sin she has committed and repents to God. Seeing heavy menstrual blood in a dream means that you are thinking a lot about difficult matters. The appearance of menstruation in a dream On an inappropriate date is a sign of an extensive diet that unmarried women will acquire. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman remembers the stable life she enjoys with her family. The vision indicates a life of luxury in which the woman lives. The vision symbolizes Affection and understanding between family members and her husband’s love for her. The vision expresses a new birth that the woman will give birth to, and God knows best. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream warns of disagreements and problems that she faces with her husband. Bathing during menstruation in a dream indicates freedom from trouble. Menstrual bleeding and the appearance of intercourse are considered In a dream, it is a sign that you are traveling with your husband to another country for work. The vision heralds a woman’s recovery from the magic that disrupted her life with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about heavy menstrual blood: A lot of flowing menstrual blood in a dream is a sign that all planned desires and goals will come true. Symbolizes seeing a lot of Blood in a dream: To collect a lot of money through work. Seeing a lot of contaminated blood in a married woman’s dream warns of problems with her husband that may last several days. Heavy menstruation and its red color indicates the breadth of the diet and the progress that the god has made in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a woman’s menstrual cycle Pregnant women: Seeing the menstrual cycle for pregnant women in a dream heralds an easy birth and the birth of a healthy child. The release of a large amount of blood in a dream is evidence of the necessity of preserving the health of the fetus so that a miscarriage does not occur, and God knows best. They symbolize seeing life. Not feeling tired in a dream leads to the birth of a male fetus, and God knows best. The vision promises making a lot of profit and saving all the expenses of childbirth. The symbol of menstruation in a dream is good news. Menstruation in a dream is good news, especially if the color of the blood is pink, this indicates that you are hearing good news. The disappearance of menstrual pain in a dream indicates an exit from sadness and a period of fatigue. Then it announces the vision of menstruation. In a dream, the sick person is healed. The vision in a man’s dream promises him the accumulation of profits and an increase in his livelihood. Redness of menstrual blood, and this indicates in the dream repentance and refraining from sins. Interpretation of dreams for a menstruating woman. Menstruating woman in a dream: It symbolizes the end of problems and the beginning of a new period away from tension. If he sees If a man is menstruating like a woman in a dream, this is evidence that he is committing sins and transgressions and that he must repent and return to God Almighty. Then he throws stones.

title: The meaning of seeing the number 50 in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the leading interpreters

preview.html: The meaning of seeing the number 50 in a dream: Numbers in general have many meanings in dreams, and many dreamers wonder what the number 50 means in a dream? We decided to transmit the following paragraphs to you through the specialized Egyptian website to answer all your questions about the interpretation of dream number 50 in all its forms and images, in which it appears in the vision of single, married, and divorced people. , widow, married, just follow below. Interpretation of a dream about the number 50 in a dream Seeing the number fifty in a dream according to Al-Osaimi indicates four positive signs, knowing that he said that the number five, 50, and even the number 50,000 will share those signs that will be clarified now: First, the dreamer will live in a state Emotional shine soon and may be of sensitive emotional personalities, and this topic, if not used properly in life, will lead to harm. In a clearer sense, which is that emotions in our lives are so important that a person is not described as ungrateful and cruel, but if their degree exceeds their limits, it will cause An imbalance in a person’s life, and in many cases he will lose control over himself and his heart will lead him to many harmful things, such as emotional attachment to disabled people, but the dreamer will stay with them just because he loves them, even though they may not reciprocate feelings. Secondly, it may indicate that the dreamer is a balanced person. This sign is the exact opposite of the previous sign, so the dreamer's personality in waking life will determine whether the interpretation of his dream will fall under the first or second indicator. With his mind and heart if necessary. Third: The vision shows the dreamer’s piety, and is interpreted by prayer, fasting, and fulfilling the duty of zakat and charity. Religiosity is shown when he treats people with kindness, goodness, and love to help them in adversity. Fourth: This dream can be interpreted if the unmarried woman sees that God is honoring her with a happy marriage and will be in Within only five months, and they will be counted after the day you see the vision directly, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi said: If the dreamer sees in his dream a gold coin with fifty piasters written on it, then this sight indicates sustenance and kindness. If the dreamer loses a 50 piaster bill in his dream, it will not be The dream is good, and although the number 50 is positive in general, if it appears this way in the vision, it will be interpreted as the dreamer’s sadness over the death of his son soon. The Egyptian website is the largest dream interpretation website in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website in Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of seeing the number 50 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer sees this number in his dream, he must be very happy, because there is an important matter for him that will be completed to the end, meaning: the sick fortune teller will recover until the end without... Setbacks. If the dreamer is creating a project at this time, then seeing this number in his dream is a sign that this project will be completed without obstacles or disagreements between him and his partners, but he will later understand that it is a profitable step in his life and will increase him with goodness and happiness. If the dreamer seeks to complete His marriage, God writes through vinegar

preview.html: If he looks at tripe from afar, this indicates his optimistic view of the happiness and goodness that will enter his life, God willing. We will present to you some interpretations of seeing tripe in a dream in detail from the interpreter. .com Follow us. Interpretation of seeing tripe in a dream for a single girl. Ibn Sirin said that an unmarried woman who sees tripe in a dream was dreaming and it was completely pure. Here is a report on many of the problems she sees and many problems that never end. In addition, he said that he lives In sadness that he cannot escape from or eliminate. Tripe in a dream, if it is clean or unclean in a dream for an unmarried woman, is bad for her. Ibn Sirin confirmed in his interpretation that tripe, eating it, and watching it is undesirable. It is a sure sign that there are some problems in The life of a single woman with her fiancé, and God knows best. Or it indicates her failure in her academic or professional life during this period, and God knows best. And the unmarried girl who looks at tripe in a dream and wants to eat from it but cannot. It shows the bad things that happen to this single woman and she must Be careful and get out of it. See also: Seeing food in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tripe in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she takes a lot of tripe and cooks it. It indicates many positive changes that will occur in her life in the near future, God willing. This also indicates Goodness and abundance will enter her life and the life of her husband soon. And if she wants to distribute tripe in a dream to people close to her in life. Here is an indication of the great affection of this dreamy married woman in her life soon. It also shows that she is a social person and does many good things in her life for others. And the married woman who cleans tripe in a dream and sits for long hours. Here, the dream is an indication of the things that this woman is omitting from her life now. And it will save you from some of the many problems that she is experiencing or facing, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing tripe in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that A foreigner gave her impure tripe. The meaning indicates that she has entered into many crises with this person in her life if she works. If this is not the case, then this indicates that someone has offered her marriage and she will live with him in great trouble. The divorced woman who cleans the tripe in the dream and cleans it Well in the dream. This is an indication that she will get rid of the bad things that she is doing in life at this time for her sake. And he will live a good and healthy life, God willing, and God knows best. And the dreaming divorced woman who buys a lot of tripe in the dream and she was clean. This indicates Meaning that she will live well for her and her family, God willing. And that it will eliminate many of the problems in which she lives and lives. Read also: Interpretation of dreaming about food in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing tripe in a dream about a man and its meaningIf the dreamer sees in a dream that tripe was next to him in the dream and he sees it. It appears. He's trying to stay away from things

title: Interpretation of a tiger in a dream: Seeing a tiger riding in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a tiger in a dream, for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man and a single man, if I dreamed that a tiger was chasing me, chasing me, attacking me, chasing me or escaping from the black and white tiger by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, Wasim Yusuf and others. Interpretation of the tiger in Dream: A live tiger in a dream indicates strength and success in pursuit and work, and a tiger imprisoned or captive in a cage or zoo indicates an imminent danger arising from poor management or thinking. If you can escape, your problems and fears will go away, but if the tiger succeeds in reaching you and manages to throw you to the ground, this is a sign of failure and the beginning of trouble. Seeing a tiger in a dream If you kill or neutralize a tiger, this portends joy and happiness in your commitment, comfort and understanding in the environment of friends. If someone threatens you with the presence of a tiger, this predicts problems in the work environment. Some friends may go back on their promises and help you. If you hear the sound of a tiger and are afraid of it, you will hear disturbing news related to the loss of work and you may have problems with those around you. If you dream of seeing a tiger that looks like a cat, this is a bad omen except If you kill it. If a tiger approaches you in a dream, your enemies will catch up with you and chase you away. If a tiger attacks you, this foretells that failure and disappointment will cause you a lot of anxiety and pain. If you succeed in driving it away or killing it, you will succeed in all your work and projects. If you dream of a tiger running away from you, this foretells that you will overcome Over difficulties and rise to the highest ranks. If you see a tiger in a cage, this foretells that you will defeat those who stand in your way and put obstacles in your way. If you see pieces of tiger skin, this foretells that you will walk on the path of wealth, happiness, and a rich life. In a dream, an unjust ruler or a powerful, cruel enemy. Whoever kills it will defeat an enemy, whoever eats its flesh will gain money and honor, whoever rides it will gain great power, and whoever marries a tiger will win immorally. Women. And whoever sees a tiger in his house, the immoral person will attack his house, and whoever is bitten by a tiger will be harmed. The tiger indicates a man or woman, and he has cunning and cunning, it indicates illness, and the tiger’s milk shows hostility in his mustache. The tiger is an extremely hostile enemy, and it is said that whoever sees a tiger in a dream asks God Almighty for forgiveness for his sins. It appears The tiger is for a people that people fear and are very afraid of. Interpretation of a tiger in a dream for Nablus. A dream about a tiger will be interpreted as an unjust force or an enemy who has strong and evil enemies. Whoever kills it will triumph over an enemy. Whoever eats its flesh will gain money and honor. Whoever rides it will gain great power. Whoever kills will marry the tiger’s shed. It indicates strength and success in the chase. Working, and a tiger imprisoned or captive in a cage or zoo indicates the imminent danger arising from mismanagement or poor thinking. And your worries disappear, but when the tiger manages to take you down and hold you to the ground, this is a sign of failure and the beginning of trouble. Interpretation of a tiger in one dream A tiger in an unmarried woman’s dream is a strong and strong young man and a sign of good luck in marriage or engagement, and the skin of a tiger in a dream indicates The foal, and the tiger attacking the girl in her dream appears to her

Interpretation of a tiger in one dream A tiger in an unmarried woman’s dream is a strong and strong young man and a sign of good luck in marriage or engagement, and the skin of a tiger in a dream indicates The foal, and the tiger attacking the girl in her dream appears to her

title: Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic: Among the disturbing dreams, there is no doubt that magic is one of the major sins. It harms and destroys, and expresses turmoil and damage, so we will learn about all the meanings that the vision explains. Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic: Seeing magic indicates harm to the dreamer due to bad company, so we find that the dream Discovering magic shows the dreamer's ability to know these people and reveal their truth to him, and he will also have the ability to get rid of people. . The evil is to stay away from them and cut off all means of communication with them, and live in safety and peace away from corruption and injustice. Discovering buried magic is a sign of getting rid of all the crises and temptations that the dreamer falls into in his life, and if the dreamer sees scattered magic, it indicates how clear the dreamer is in Knowing the hypocrites in his life. He should stay away from them and avoid them so that no harm or evil befalls him because of these malevolent intentions. Interpretation of the dream of discovering magic by Ibn Sirini Our respected scholar and sheikh Ibn Shirin believes that the dream of discovering magic is a sign of overcoming evil and harm from the dreamer’s life and knowing all the hypocrites who are causing him trouble and harm. But if the dreamer approaches the Lord, he will be able to repel this person’s plan to kill him, with God’s grace. We also find that discovering magic in any other place, such as the home, cemetery, or work, is only an indication of solving the problems that the viewer faces at home and work, where he finds possible solutions. For all his problems. Live in peace, away from hate and hostility. Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic for a single woman. The vision of discovering magic for an unmarried woman is not considered a benign vision, because it leads to a bad relationship with her fiancé and a lack of good morals. If she discovers witchcraft inside the cemetery, this leads to her relationship with a corrupt person, the dreamer must purify herself and pay attention to her prayers to get closer to God Almighty and repent from all these wrong actions, so she will find kindness and comfort in her life. The vision is a warning of the need to beware of those who are trying to trap her in his network while trying to deceive her with his false promises. She should beware of this person and not abandon the duties of God Almighty no matter what happens. It happens, and she must also stay away from all wrong behaviors that harm her reputation. Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic and sorcery for a single woman: For single women, a dream about discovering and deciphering magic represents survival from evil and the ability to stay away from anything that harms it, such as the evil eye or a treacherous friend. Something to save her and bring her into good company. He seeks to gain the love and satisfaction of God Almighty by all means. Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about discovering magic for a married woman indicates that she has uncovered all the traitors in her life, and as for the presence of magic in her home, this prompts her to commit many sins from which she must repent and return to God. Come here. Machine. So that he can survive these disasters permanently and not live in evil. The vision expresses her freedom from the anguish and distress that almost caused her to divorce her husband due to the jealousy of haters, so she must thank her Lord who saves her.

title: Interpretation of the letter M in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the letter M in a dream through a website. Check out roy2a.com. The letter M is the twenty-fourth letter of the alphabet that is pronounced between the lips. Through today’s article, we will give you interpretations of seeing the letter M in a dream and the most common words on the lips of great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin. Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of the letter M in a dream. Seeing a toilet in a dream indicates relief from the worries and anxiety that befall the viewer. Seeing the Qur’an in a dream indicates guidance, good deeds, and tearing in a dream are signs of magic and envy. A comb in a dream indicates achieving good deeds that are almost benefits. Seeing a mosque in a dream indicates useful learning and good work. A calf in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows from the dreamer’s life. See another interpretation: Interpretation of the letter Qaf in a dream. Interpretation of the letter M in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the letter M in a dream is a sign of peace of mind and peace of mind that God will soon enjoy. Writing the letter M in a dream indicates goodness and livelihood coming to the dreamer. Drawing the letter M on the wall in a dream indicates loss of anxiety and sadness. Seeing him in a dream writing the letter M on paper indicates useful knowledge and useful study that he received or was given by God. See another interpretation: Interpretation The letter R in a dream. Interpretation of death in a dream. Seeing death in a dream indicates the loss of sadness, anxiety, and problems that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Seeing death in a dream means about changes and the beginning of a new life for the pioneer. Seeing death without an illness appearing or an occasion to enrich the poor. Death in a person’s dream indicates the approaching date of his wedding. Seeing death in a patient’s dream is a sign of his recovery. Death in a dream can mean repentance for sins. Interpretation of the letter M in a dream for a single woman. Seeing rain in a dream for a single woman indicates the loss of sorrows and distress from her life and the many good things that come her way. Seeing clothes in a dream indicates a woman Unmarried and it was made of cotton, which would cost you a lot of money. As for seeing old clothes in a single woman’s dream? A sign of sadness and anxiety. Interpretation of the letter M in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the letters of the alphabet in a dream for a married woman is an indication of the goodness that she will obtain. Dreaming about counting letters The alphabet means that a married woman will get rid of sorrows and problems in her life. Seeing the letters of the alphabet scattered in a dream indicates that a married woman will have changes in her life. Seeing searching for the letter M in a dream The middle of the remaining letters indicates being confused about something. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing The letter Ain in a dream. Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream. Seeing yourself eating bananas in a dream means food and goodness for the dreamer. Throwing bananas in a dream for a virtuous man who has prestige and money and works for his afterlife. Interpretation of seeing salt in a dream. Salt in a dream. It symbolizes money that comes without hardship, such as inheritance. I see myself eating salt as I live in

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake bite in a dream in detail

preview.html: It is known that a snake in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life who wants to harm him and harm him. Below we will show you in detail the interpretation of seeing a snake bite in a dream. Interpretation of a snake bite in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one sees in a dream a snake trying to bite, but the dreamer is able to escape from it Without causing him any harm, this indicates that there is a cunning enemy who wants to harm the dreamer, but God will reveal that to the dreamer. They deceive this person and save him from his machinations. But if a person sees a snake that manages to bite him, this is evidence of the presence of an enemy capable of harming him. Harm to insight. And if someone sees a snake biting him, this is evidence that there is a woman in his life who hates him and wants harm and evil, and often This woman is not one of his relatives. If someone sees that a snake enters his house and bites him or a member of his family or harms someone from the house, this indicates the emergence of major problems between him and his family and the entry of strife and major problems that are difficult to solve. Especially if someone sees that a snake has entered his house and tries to To harm him, and the dreamer was able to overpower him and kill him and eat the snake’s flesh, then this is evidence of goodness and nourishment. The dreamer will earn a lot of lawful money, and there will be goodness and blessings in his home. Seeing a snake bite for a married woman. If the married woman sees that a snake entered her house and tried to bite her Or she bites her husband, this is evidence of the presence of enemies who are trying to stir up strife between her and her husband, and who bear her ill intentions and wish them for her. Family harm. If a married woman sees that she has a snake and this snake tries to harm her, this may mean that she has a male child who will be a disobedient son in the family, and it will lead to many problems for her and her mother. Interpretation of seeing a snake bite for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that he bites her A snake, this is evidence that she is pregnant with a boy, but when this boy grows up he will be corrupt and disobedient to his mother and father. Interpretation of a snake bite for single women: If a single girl sees that there is a huge snake wrapped around her and she will not be able to get rid of it, this indicates that someone will rape her. But if She saw that a snake was trying to bite her, but she was able to escape from it, then God will save her from a great conspiracy that is being conspired against her. But if a girl sees that she was bitten by a snake and sees it without trying to resist it, this indicates that she will commit adultery with someone with her consent. For anyone who has visions and interprets them, we welcome your comments in End of the article via the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream or a dream through the vision website Roy2a.com. Seeing a bra indicates good news and the fulfillment of desires. It may indicate marriage, unpopularity, a broken bra, and indicates the death of a close person, and we will explain that in detail in this article. Interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream about A married man, an unmarried young man, and an unmarried girl, as well as a married and pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a widow, and by providing interpretations by the leading interpreters of visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad bin Sirin in the past, and scholars of interpretation and visions in the modern era, so please follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing a bra? In a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a bra in a dream indicates hearing good news and pregnancy for a married woman. Seeing children’s clothes for married women announces the good news of her short pregnancy, joy, pleasure and sweetness of her short pregnancy. Seeing a bra being cut off indicates the loss of a loved one by deportation or death. Seeing a bra being washed indicates To achieve goals and achieve what is desired. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hole in the chest in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream for a single woman: A vision of exposing a bra in front of people in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the disclosure of private secrets and scandals. If a girl sees that she is buying a bra, remember her approach. In marriage. If an unmarried girl sees her bra cut off, it indicates bad behavior and wrong decisions. What is the interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a bra in a dream for a married woman indicates that I hear happy news and stability for my husband and family. If a married woman sees that her bra is cut off In front of people, it indicates the revelation of her cover and her scandals. If a married woman sees that her breasts are too large, it indicates many problems and quarrels. Seeing a woman reading from the Qur’an in a beautiful voice in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety and the return of the traveler or expatriate. See also: Interpretation of seeing breast milk In a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a bra in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth and good luck. If a pregnant woman sees a white bra, it symbolizes the elimination of troubles and troubles and giving birth safely and easily. If a pregnant woman sees cut off bras, it indicates birth Difficult, wobbly, and a lot of fatigue and suffering. What is the interpretation of seeing a bra in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing a bra in a divorced woman’s dream portends a lot of goodness and comfort after fatigue and hearing good news. If a divorced woman sees that she has bought two new bracelets, it indicates good luck and the fulfillment of desires and may indicate her marriage. Again. See also: Written prayer for blood for menstruation. What is the interpretation of buying a bra in a dream for a single woman: Looking at the bra market for individuals. It means hearing good news, many good things and achieving what you want. Seeing a bra in a dream portends good luck and getting close to marriage. Seeing a bra Chest wearing clothesIt indicates the girl's introversion and loneliness. What is the interpretation of a solution

title: Interpretation of a dream about strawberries

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Strawberries are a delicious and refreshing fruit that contains glands of nutrients. The entrance, or the newborn of a married woman, also indicates the health of the fortune teller, and also indicates that there are no differences between the husband and wife and indicates excellence in study or work. Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing strawberries in a dream in Ibn Sirin shows many clues that we will present to you. The interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream is evidence of the successes that will happen to the visionary, such as promotions at work or that he will pass a stage of studies with distinction and success. Strawberries in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, also indicate the experience of a new and successful romantic relationship full of love and emotions. Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream by Al-Nabulsi The interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream by Imam Al-Nabulsi also shows several interpretations that we will present to you in this paragraph. Seeing strawberries in a dream in Imam Al-Nabulsi indicates the approaching marriage of the visionary regardless of his emotional state, God willing. Seeing strawberries in a dream in Imam Al-Nabulsi also indicates that the dreamer will be in good health and strong and will recover from diseases if he suffers from any disease. If a pregnant woman sees red strawberries in her dream, this indicates that she does not feel pain during pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream for a woman Married The interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are no differences between her and her husband and that they enjoy a stable and happy life. If a married woman sees in her dream a plate with a lot of strawberries, but there are yellow strawberries, this indicates an abundance of food and goodness that God gives to her and her husband, God willing, but there are obstacles and people who do this. I do not wish her success in her life. If a married woman sees red strawberries in her dream, this indicates her love for her husband and children and their stable family life, and also that she is able to bear responsibility on her own. Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying red strawberries, this means that God will bless her with a beautiful girl and she will be a supporter of her in her life. Also, a pregnant woman seeing strawberries indicates that she will get rid of all the stress of pregnancy and her health will be completely stable. Also, seeing strawberries in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy and natural birth. Interpretation of a dream about giving strawberries to a young man The interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates that his marriage is approaching and that he is about to meet his life partner. If an unmarried young man dreams that he is giving strawberries to the girl he loves, this may indicate the end of the relationship. Interpretation of seeing rotten strawberries for an unmarried woman Seeing rotten strawberries for an unmarried girl in a dream indicates the obstacles that she will face in her emotional life. If an unmarried girl sees rotten strawberries in her dream and eats them, this means that there is someone in her life who is jealous and angry with her and she must be careful not to
